Description:
Our secret weapon for flawless self tan application! A soft, washable mitt for applying self-tanning products.
This mitt ensures an even, streak-free application of St. Tropez Mousse and Spray products and protects the palms from staining.
ReviewText: Although I do use the mitt to apply my tan and it works great for that, the product is stained onto the mitt constantly dispite washing.  It also falls apart.  I hand wash it in warm water with Dove Sensitive Body Wash (a mild soap) after each use.  I only get about 3-4 weeks use out of it (I apply my tan every 3-5 days) before the black backing on it falls off and it is unusable.  Not a good quality product especially for $9.00 a piece.
Title: Poor Quality

Description:
Our secret weapon for flawless self tan application! A soft, washable mitt for applying self-tanning products.
This mitt ensures an even, streak-free application of St. Tropez Mousse and Spray products and protects the palms from staining.
ReviewText:
The mitt turns orange and ends up looking nasty and dirty after just a couple uses, but as long as you wash it after every use you're going to be fine. 

Definitely get a mitt rather than using your hand to apply any sort of self-tanner, though - not just St Tropaz products. You will regret NOT using a mitt, but you'll probably want to give your hands a good wash even after using the mitt just to be sure you don't end up with any orange blobs on your palms or wrists.
Title: Does the trick

Description:
Our secret weapon for flawless self tan application! A soft, washable mitt for applying self-tanning products.
This mitt ensures an even, streak-free application of St. Tropez Mousse and Spray products and protects the palms from staining.
ReviewText: I love the mit but its the quality I hate. I won't sunless tan without one. Maybe its because I'm a male but if lucky it will last 4 uses max before the glue lets go on the seam. I have tried washing it gently like the instructions said but seems to last longer without washing and the short period it last I dont think it matters. I'm going to try sewing the seam on this one before i use it.
Title: One time USE

Description:
Our secret weapon for flawless self tan application! A soft, washable mitt for applying self-tanning products.
This mitt ensures an even, streak-free application of St. Tropez Mousse and Spray products and protects the palms from staining.
ReviewText: This product definitely applies the self tanner really well.  I have never had an issue with streaks or missing any spots.  This mitt blends the tan into one even layer perfectly!  I also really like there smaller sizes to use on my face.  They allow me to blend around the contours of my face without creating a buildup on the skin.
Title: Great applicator!

ReviewText: This tan applicator mitt is a game changer for self-tanning. Works well to protect hands from the dreaded spray tan hand and helps ensure smooth application. I love that it is made in the UK and feels soft and is washable. Jenuine Tip: the small mitt is great for the face and doing contouring with your fav self tanner.
Title: Great Mitt for Tan Application

Description:

ReviewText: This is an excellent applicator Mitt.  I have had mine for over a year and it is still in perfect condition.  I wash it in mild detergent and let it dry and it's ready for the next time I use it.  I have tried another brand, but St. Tropez is a far superior product.  You won't be disappointed.

Description: Rescue extremely dry, dehydrated skin with this sumptuous silky lotion that locks in nourishing moisture for 24 hours. Feelings of tightness virtually disappear, thanks to Lancôme’s ultra hydrating formula that ’s enriched with Royal Jelly for lasting comfort. Almost immediately, skin feels smooth, supple and cushiony-soft.
ReviewText: My skin responded to this product in such a beautiful way. The old skin on my hands glistened like a speckeled stone under running water. The age spots after six months of use faded to a blended tone of my natural skin. The texture of the areas of loose skin changed in smoothness and elasticity. The sheen of the product is amazing and not oil-like is appearance. This product returned the minky softness to my bodys protective shield which has weathered much over the years.
Title: silky softness like a mink fur

Description: Rescue extremely dry, dehydrated skin with this sumptuous silky lotion that locks in nourishing moisture for 24 hours. Feelings of tightness virtually disappear, thanks to Lancôme’s ultra hydrating formula that ’s enriched with Royal Jelly for lasting comfort. Almost immediately, skin feels smooth, supple and cushiony-soft.
ReviewText: ever since I got a small sample years ago...I thought this cream did the best job of making my skin soft and healthy looking. the texture sinks in well, with no stickiness or oil feel. It is a MUST cool weather seasons- when skin is challenged. The soft fragrance does not interfere with other products or aggravate allergies.. I WISH LANCOME WOULD ADD ANOTHER CITRUS FRAGRANCE product to this line for those o us who crave those smells...
Title: the best skin moisturizer

Product Name: Ultra Sun Protection Cream (Broad Spectrum SPF 50)
Description: Providing powerful protection for your skin, this innovative protective veil actually becomes even more effective when comes into contact with water or perspiration.
ReviewText: This product left a white cast on my face when applying, and personally I found it to be too heavy. But I think if applied to your body, on the spots that are especially prone to sun exposure, it should be fine.
Title: Leaves a white cast

Product Name: Ultra Sun Protection Cream (Broad Spectrum SPF 50)
Description: Providing powerful protection for your skin, this innovative protective veil actually becomes even more effective when comes into contact with water or perspiration.
ReviewText: This is a good product and works well to protect your face. However it is really expensive! Probably could find a cheaper alternative just as good.
Title: Good product

Description: Are you looking for a fast and easy sun-kissed look, whatever the season? Gelée Auto-Bronzante self-tanning Gel (FAIR) gives your body a natural and uniform tan that also offers 24h hydration.
ReviewText:
i usually really like biotherm products so i am sad to give a negative review, but i have never had any success with this product. i have used this several times, after careful exfoliation, sometimes with and and sometimes without a tanning mitt, but i always end up with a streaky tan. i don't think it's my technique, i frequently use other brands and have no problem.

i gave it two stars because it at least gives decent colour apart from the streaks. i think this product could be improved if it went on tinted so i could see where i am putting it. i know it says that it's tinted on the packaging but i really don't find that to be the case.
Title: streak city

Description: Are you looking for a fast and easy sun-kissed look, whatever the season? Gelée Auto-Bronzante self-tanning Gel (FAIR) gives your body a natural and uniform tan that also offers 24h hydration.
ReviewText: my mom bought me this because i hate being pale and i stopped tanning in the beds. It felt okay but no matter how many times i tried it was always streaky and blotchy so i wasn't overly in favour.
Title: okay but not great.
